Tomorrow she is going to visit her grandmother.
Demain elle va visiter sa grand-mère.

They are going to the movies next week.
Ils vont au cinéma la semaine prochaine.

I am going to speak French.
Je vais parler français.

We are going to listen to the radio.
Nous allons écouter la radio.\\~\\On va écouter la radio.

You're going to listen to music?
Est-ce que tu vas écoute de la musique?

Are you going to go to the market tomorrow?
Est-ce que tu vas aller au marché demain?\\~\\Est-ce que vous allez aller au marché demain?

I am going to have a shower.
Je vais me doucher.

This evening I am going to go to bed at ten o'clock.
Ce soir je vais me coucher à vingt-deux heures.

Tomorrow I am going to wake up at nine o'clock.
Demain je vais me lever à neuf heures.

Tomorrow I am going to brush my teeth at ten o'clock.
Demain je vais me brosser les dents à dix heures.

I am not going to sing.
Je ne vais pas chanter.

We are not going to walk.
Nous n'allons pas marcher.

You're not going to have something to drink?
Tu ne vas pas boire quelque chose?

She is not going to sing the song.
Elle ne va pas chanter la chanson.

We are not going to visit Paris this year.
Nous n'allons pas visiter Paris cette année.

You're not going to make any mistakes.
Tu ne vas pas faire de fautes.

I'm not going to make a mistake.
Je ne vais pas me tromper.

I am not going to get soaked this evening.
Je ne vais pas me tremper ce soir.

I am not going to eat in the restaurant this evening.
Je ne vais pas manger au restaurant ce soir.

You're really going to like ...
Tu vas bien aimer ...
